title: Creative Process
choices: curious exploration of materials and tools
thoughtful engagement of historical concepts and skills
holistic thinking in the design process
active participation in the acquisition of artistic skills and techniques
excited engagement in brainstorming and idea generation
focused intention in creating artwork which they find aesthetically pleasing

title: Flow
choices: shows the capability to dive deeply into the process of creating
shows great focus and attention. They show intentionality in their work
shows ebb and flow. They work diligently at times, while finding themselves off-task other times
shows a struggle to find their ideal creative zone. This is an area of improvement they could work on during class time, recognizing and seeking their ideal work ethic for creating
